Ferozepur Jhirka: This princely state was abolished by the British Raj in 1858 after the Rebellion of 1857.
The 1828 CE The Imperial Gazetteer of India of East India Company refers to this area as Lesser Balochistan
also known as Ferojpur Jhirka: a likely reference to arrival of people from Balochistan during Lodhi era who might have been the rulers of Ferozepur Jhirka area from Lodhi era onward. They likely built the Taoru Tomb complex during the successive dynasties. The largests tomb belongs to a Baloch.
